title: 論壇簽名
author: 陳焌傑
txt_content:
話說論壇下面的簽名，我看到有人用到“成就”來做他的簽名，怎樣弄？別要跟我講用什麼圖床，就是不知道怎樣按啊。有哪位大大可以幫我小弟啊？
ENG:(100%grammar mistake)
I often see that many people use “achievement”to be the signature of the forum，how to make？ dont tell me about using figure store，I just don't know how to use.who is glad to help me the newbie？

replies.author: Rock_DoraG
replies.txt_content:
有时你会看到那签名右下角会有一个小小的网址
进那个网站就行了
